verbs.description: [ARG0: ryanair] [V: defends] [ARG1: cabin crew handling of racist rant on flight] ryanair defended on friday its handling of an incident in which a passenger shouted racist abuse at an elderly black woman saying cabin crew had not been aware of the nature of his comments until after the flight getty images conor humphries essex police ryanair helen popper barcelona getty
